component.name: TrustyTodo
component.summary: TrustyTodo is a clear and initiative task management interface for CalDAV servers

description.p: TrustyTodo is a task manager meant to connect to your self-hosted tasks server, it is designed to work with CalDAV servers (e.g. Nextcloud, Fastmail, etc.). Tasks are fetched & synced with your server, you are in total control of your data!

Features:
No vendor lock-in: Switch to any other CalDAV TODO app, or use multiple at the same time.
Data ownership: Tasks contain private data, it is synced between your device and your CalDAV server, never to us.
Recurring tasks: Create tasks that come back every day, week, month, etc.
Today view: View all tasks due today on all your projects.
Upcoming view: View all due tasks, and tasks for the coming days.
Project view: View all tasks for a specific project.
Calendar view: View your tasks on a calendar.
